thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 13 of 3253
thread.title: Filip

author: Filip
title: Filip
text: After having booked a car with drop off at a different location, which was clearly chosen in the rental conditions, I received a certain (good) price. Everything seemed fine and it was clearly stated where the car would be picked up and dropped off and what the price was. After this I received an email from rentalcars.com stating that I would need to pay an additional 200$ for the different location. If that was immediately stated, I wouldn't have chosen their offer. So it's a rip-off, they give a good price upfront and then ask for additional fees later. After stating I was unwilling to pay the additional 200$, booking was cancelled without any explanation or any email.
